title: Miami Beach issues curfew after 2 people killed during spring break festivities
description: Miami Beach has imposed a state of emergency and an overnight curfew starting 11:59 p.m. Sunday after fatal shootings occurred during spring break festivities.

title: Miami Beach sets spring break curfew after 2 fatal shootings
description: There have been rowdy, chaotic crowds that police have had trouble controlling.

title: Mike Pence says voters are ready to move past Trump for a 'fresh start'
description: Mike Pence, in an ABC News sit-down on "This Week," talked about Trump's possible arrest, support for Ukraine, a 2024 campaign and more

title: 5 minors killed in crash after car veers off highway, officials say
description: Five minors have been killed in a crash after a car veered off a highway in Westchester, New York, according to officials.

title: 2 off-piste skiers missing in avalanche near Mont Blanc
description: Rescue teams are searching for two off-piste skiers who were caught in an avalanche near Mont Blanc on Italy’s northern border with France

title: Higher cancer rates found in military pilots, ground crews
description: A Pentagon study has found high rates of cancer among military pilots and, for the first time, shows that ground crews who fuel, maintain and launch those aircraft are also getting sick

title: COVID-19: A look back on where the US succeeded and where we didn’t
description: Public health experts explain to ABC News where the U.S. succeeded and where it didn't as the third anniversary of the pandemic passes.

title: Man stabbed to death on a carousel at a German funfair
description: Officials have shut down a large funfair in western Germany after a man was stabbed to death on a carousel Saturday night

title: Pence indicates that he will not challenge all aspects of special counsel's subpoena
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence indicated on "This Week" that he is not challenging all aspects of the subpoena issued last month by special counsel Jack Smith.

title: Macron's leadership at risk amid tensions over pension plan
description: A parody photo appearing on protest signs and online in France shows President Emmanuel Macron sitting on piles of garbage

title: N Korea launches missile into sea amid US-S Korea drills
description: North Korea has launched a short-range ballistic missile toward the sea, its neighbors say, as the North ramps up testing activities in response to U.S.-South Korean military drills that it views as an invasion rehearsal

title: WATCH:  Man has emotional reunion with dog he gave up 10 years ago
description: After a move forced a man to give up his dog Smokey, he was brought to tears when the two reunited 10 years later.

title: Snowy Michigan pileup ensnares up to 100 vehicles
description: There were reports of injuries that do not appear to be serious, police said.
